mapper.select: SELECT PC.COMP_NAME, PC.COMP_CODE, PC.COMP_LICENSE, PM.MEM_NAME, PM.MEM_DEPT, PM.MEM_PHONE, PC.COMP_PHONE, PM.MEM_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_NAME, PC.COMP_ACCT_DEPT, PC.COMP_ACCT_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_PHONE FROM PG_MEMBER PM INNER JOIN PG_COMPANY PC ON PM.COMP_CODE = PC.COMP_CODE WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{memId}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(WSS_RESERV_CODE), '') FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE WHERE WSS_RESERV_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{wssReservCode},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE PG_COMPANY SET COMP_PHONE = #{compPhone}, COMP_ACCT_NAME = #{compAcctName}, COMP_ACCT_DEPT = #{compAcctDept}, COMP_ACCT_EMAIL = #{compAcctEmail}, COMP_PHONE = #{compPhone}, COMP_ACCT_PHONE = #{compAcctPhone} WHERE COMP_CODE = #{compCode}
mapper.select: SELECT PSC.WSS_ST_DAY, PSC.WSS_ED_DAY, PS.WS_NAME FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE PSC INNER JOIN PG_SHOP PS on PSC.WS_CODE = PS.WS_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PSC.WSS_APPROVAL = #{wssApproval} AND PSC.WSS_ST_DAY > #{wssStDay}

SELECT PWD.WD_ST_DT, PWD.WD_ED_DT, PS.WS_NAME, PWD.WD_DAY FROM PG_WEEK_DAY PWD INNER JOIN PG_SHOP PS ON PWD.WD_KIND = PS.WS_CODE WHERE PWD.WD_CON = 1 AND PS.WS_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND PWD.WD_KIND = #{wdKind}
SELECT PWD.WD_ST_DT, PWD.WD_ED_DT, PWD.WD_DAY FROM PG_WEEK_DAY PWD WHERE PWD.WD_CON = 1 AND PWD.WD_KIND = 'b'
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE WHERE WS_CODE = #{wsCode} AND WSS_RESERV_DAY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wssStDay},'%')
